articles.title: Ben Affleck will return as Batman in Aquaman 2 as well as The Flash

articles.title: Bernard Cribbins helped remind the world Doctor Who is about kindness
articles.description: The beloved British actor had a storied career that included one of the most memorable arcs in Doctor Who history, which included the end of David Tennant’s beloved Tenth Doctor.

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: Katamari Damacy creator Keita Takahashi teases new game for Annapurna
articles.description: Keita Takahashi and studio Uvula team up with Annapurna Interactive for a new, untitled game that will feature a dog that licks faces, at the very least.
articles.content: Keita Takahashi and Uvula team up with Annapurna Interactive

articles.author: Austen Goslin
articles.title: Marilyn Monroe’s Netflix biopic, Blonde, leans into tragedy in trailer
articles.description: Netflix’s Blonde, a biopic about Marilyn Monroe staring Ana de Armas, has its first trailer and lets the star tell her own, slightly fictionalized, story about her tragic life.
articles.content: Ana de Armas stars as Norma Jean herself

articles.title: Philip K. Dick alternate-reality biopic starring Charlize Theron, Jane, announced
articles.description: A look at what might have happened if Philip K. Dick’s real-life twin sister hadn’t passed away at six weeks old, Jane will twist reality to show what could have been.

articles.author: Toussaint Egan
articles.title: Goat Simulator 3 promises a ‘Digital Downgrade’ edition,  exciting ‘Pre-Udder’ content
articles.description: Coffee Stain Publishing and Coffee Stain North announced today that Goat Simulator 3, the direct sequel to 2014’s Goat Simulator, will release on November 17 on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X, and Epic Games Store.
articles.content: Did you know the goat had a name? Neither did I!
